Start: Welcome to the Media Downloader Bot! Commands: - /help: Display this help message. How to use: To download media from TikTok or Instagram, simply send a link directly to the bot. The bot will process the link and send the media file back to you. Additional Notes: Ensure that content is directly accessible (not private or restricted). Supported formats: - TikTok Videos; - TikTok Photo Slides; - Instagram Reels; - Instagram Stories; - Instagram Photos; - Instagram Slides.
Help: Commands: - /help: Display this help message. How to use: To download media from TikTok or Instagram, simply send a link directly to the bot. The bot will process the link and send the media file back to you. Additional Notes: Ensure that content is directly accessible (not private or restricted). Supported formats: - TikTok Videos; - TikTok Photo Slides; - Instagram Reels; - Instagram Stories; - Instagram Photos; - Instagram Slides.
FailedGetResponse: Failed to get a response from API.
TiktokQuotaExceeded: TikTok API Quota Exceeded. Upgrade your plan.
InstagramPhotosQuotaExceeded: Instagram Photos API Quota Exceeded. Upgrade your plan.
InstagramReelsQuotaExceeded: Instagram Reels API Quota Exceeded. Upgrade your plan.
InstagramStoriesQuotaExceeded: Instagram Stories API Quota Exceeded. Upgrade your plan.
ConfigNotLoaded: Something wrong with .env file. May be, it not exists.
LogLevelNotLoaded: Something wrong with .env LOG_LEVEL. May be, there's no field with this name.
LogLevelUndefined: Undefined LOG_LEVEL. Possible levels: error, warn, info, debug, trace, off
NameNotLoaded: Something wrong with .env BOT_NAME. May be, there's no field with this name.
TokenNotLoaded: Something wrong with .env BOT_TOKEN. May be, there's no field with this name.
WhitelistEnabledNotLoaded: Something wrong with .env WHITELIST. May be, there's no field with this name.
WhitelistEnabledUndefined: Undefined WHITELIST option. Possible variants: ON or OFF.
NoResult: Unfortunately, there's no content at this link.
ServerError: Error message: Something is wrong either with the bot or with API. Please report this incident to the bot administrator.
UserError: User Error. Something wrong with user input
NotWhitelisted: You are not in the whitelist. If you believe this is a mistake, please contact the administrator.
